selected_quotes: Organisms without brains or neurons can still make complex decisions. Check out our review online at Animal Behaviour
Our review on decision-making in organisms without a brain is out!
Review paper on decision-making in 'non-neuronal' organisms just out - looks like an interesting read!
Reviewer said: This manuscript will be a mandatory reading for my students if and when it is published -

citation.title: Information integration and multiattribute decision making in non-neuronal organisms
